name: Earth Bed
description:
GAME BY Jason Xu

You woke up in a grave yard surrounded by vicious ghosts. Find a way to get out of here! (This game was made using processing in 3 days for a school assignment). [SFU - IAT 167 - Assignment 5]

1. controls:
A,S,D,W movements
SPACE interact/next line of dialogue
R bright mode (use hp to lighten up the screen and stops the enemy).

2. level editor:
the file "data\map\map.png" determines how the level is generated, black is wall, white is ground, etc.
